SUBJECT:   Hello Sir
  Hello Sir
I am Geraldo Poroshenko, I am the son of late Mr. Vadym Poroshenko from republic of Ukraine. I am now living as a refugee in Poland because of the war between my country Ukraine and Russian that lead the death of my father and my mother died of high blood pressure (HBP) in refugees camp in Poland  ,
My reason for contacting you is because I need your help like your own son to assist me to invest my fund $36.7million dollars left for me by my late father 
The proof of fund documents concerning this deposit and amount involved will be sent to you for a reference so that you can contact JP Morgan bank and decide your investment plan for me . I will be happy if you can take me like your own child and Almighty will bless you.
 Thanks I wait your reply, please reply and keep as top secret 
send me your number to communicate direct with you
Yours Sincerely,
Geraldo poroshenko for family
